spells.name: Lift
spells.description: Reduce the weight of an object.

spells.name: Slam
spells.description: Knock target Prone with heavy force.

spells.name: Heavy
spells.description: You cannot be moved against your will.

spells.name: Nullify
spells.description: Stop all momentum in an area.

spells.name: Hold
spells.description: Keep a door or object shut.

spells.name: Trip
spells.description: Create an obstacle to trip foes.

spells.name: Absorb
spells.description: Take damage meant for an ally.

spells.name: Dodge
spells.description: Bonus to AC vs one attack.

spells.name: Sever
spells.description: Cut off a limb or appendage.
